An error occurs when we generate PDF with some specials PNG images.
I put as attachment the stacktrace of the error, and the fo file.

creator: nahuel.angelinetti@revues.org
text: I forget to say that this appens only generating PDF, If I generate rtf, png, or any other, it works.
resetting P2 open bugs to P3 pending further review
creator: gadams@apache.org

text: please provide (1) a *MINIMAL* input FO file that contains *NOTHING* more than what is required to produce the error and which uses only local image files, and (2) the image files that produce the exception, and (3) all console output from invoking FOP;
